subtitle: A good accompaniment for many meat, poultry and fish dishes.

method.text: Place the shallots in a pan and cover with cold water. Bring to the boil and simmer for 5 min. Drain well.

Melt the butter in a heavy-based frying pan. Add the sugar, seasoning and shallots. Cover and cook for 10 min until the shallots are tender and well glazed, stirring occasionally to prevent the sugar burning.
Transfer to a warmed serving dish. Sprinkle with freshly chopped parsley..

title: Glazed shallots
